text: Ri Herodes Agripa xukꞌot kichiꞌ ri e chajinelabꞌ, kꞌa te riꞌ xtaqan che kikamisaxik. Ri Herodes are xbꞌantaj we riꞌ rumal xeꞌkꞌol pa Cesarea jun janipa qꞌij.12:19 Ri taqanik rech ri tinimit Roma, kubꞌij chi ri ajmak ri tzꞌapital pa cheꞌ kakꞌojiꞌ chilaꞌ kꞌa katzoqopix na bꞌik. Ri chajil re ri cheꞌ we kutzoqopij bꞌik ri ajmak are kok kan che ukꞌaxel, we kꞌu katzꞌapiꞌ pa cheꞌ o kakamisaxik.
